author: crossley
msg: Upgrade entity-resolver to the current version from xml-commons.
This enables parsing of "XML Catalogs" that have a document type declaration
which would otherwise cause a Catch-22 situation.

author: crossley
msg: - Added document type declaration for catalog DTD, but commented-out because
many tools cannot cope with this Catch-22 unless they are using the most
recent version of xml-commons entity resolver.
